item.title: Most common interviewer mistakes
item.description: If you do interviews, maybe these lines resonate with you and help you get better.

item.title: Most common mistakes during interviews
item.description: Some common mistakes candidates make during the interview that are highly avoidable, so I thought I’d spend just a little bit of time writing those down and share them.
